img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Brook_10.jpg)
Head back up along the brook and climb up to the middle part of the river. Here you can head upsteam and harvest a variety of materials as you do, just beware of some Croaky enemies hiding in the waters.
img_below_text:
Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left.
![Wukong Brook 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_Brook_13.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 52 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Brook 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Brook_10.jpg)
Head back up along the brook and climb up to the middle part of the river. Here you can head upsteam and harvest a variety of materials as you do, just beware of some Croaky enemies hiding in the waters."
            - Following Text: "Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left.
![Wukong Brook 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_Brook_13.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist facing an enemy in a snowy, mountainous area. The preceding text suggests the player has been harvesting materials along a brook and encountering enemies, while the following text indicates the player should return to the Brook Shrine and proceed up a hill. The image likely serves to illustrate a specific encounter or challenge the player faces in this part of the game, emphasizing the need for strategic combat and exploration in the harsh, wintery environment.
